thread.title: Sarah

author: Sarah
title: Sarah
text: Was asked to show proof of identification in order to accept my order in order to prevent fraudulent purchases. This may have been due to my payment address being different to my shipping address. However, I did not feel comfortable sending these details and have not been living at my current address long enough to show proof of address which was the alternative. Emailed them through their website asking for a refund and was given a full refund immediately. (within the hour) Although I'm disappointed I cannot get my order, they issued a full refund immediately. Thought I'd leave a review since reading all of these reviews made me a little nervous after I emailed asking for a refund.
